author: @oludhe7
text: For those of you tearing your hair out to figure out why even after changing from Event to Input in the @app.callback, it still doesn't work; it's because the Input is now being given as an input into the function 'update_graph_scatter'. I simply fixed this by putting a random variable into the function call 'update_graph_scatter(graph_update)' and it worked.   I worked this out by looking into the error on the dashboard - 'TypeError: update_graph_scatter() takes 0 positional arguments but 1 was given'. Just add whatever you want in there - you don't necessarily need to reference it as the input is just a refresh call every second.  Also, change the Input in the @app.callback from [Input('graph-update', 'interval')] to [Input('graph-update', 'n_intervals')] as the object in the back is now called 'n_intervals' from the dcc.Interval call
